channel.title: ScanX – IPO News
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX IPO News

item.title: Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price
item.description: Top News Vidya Wires Limited Lists at ₹52.13 on BSE, Trades Above Issue Price 22 hours ago Vidya Wires Limited debuted on BSE at ₹52.13 per share, trading above its IPO issue price of ₹52.00. The listing reflects a modest premium of ₹0.13, representing approximately 0.25% gains over the offer price. The successful market debut enables regular trading of the company's shares on the exchange.

item.title: Bharat Global Developers Delays Q2FY26 Financial Results Submission Due to Pending Data Finalization
item.description: Bharat Global Developers Delays Q2FY26 Financial Results Submission Due to Pending Data Finalization 8 minutes ago Bharat Global Developers Ltd. has disclosed to BSE the reasons for delayed submission of Q2FY26 unaudited financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025. The company cited pending key financial data and adjustments as primary causes, with board meetings rescheduled from September to November 2025, yet still missing regulatory deadlines under SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2018.

item.title: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025
item.description: Nifty and Sensex Close in Green: Market Wrap for December 11, 2025 2 hours ago Indian stock markets ended positively on December 11, with Nifty 50 up 0.55% at 25,898.55 and Sensex rising 0.51% to 84,818.13. Market breadth was bullish with 2,597 advancing stocks out of 4,548 traded. Key buzzing stocks included InterGlobe Aviation, Biocon Biologics, and Kaynes Technology, driven by company-specific news and analyst actions.

item.title: Yogi Limited Secures Order Worth ₹187.7 Crores
item.description: Yogi Limited Secures Order Worth ₹187.7 Crores 1 minute ago Yogi Limited has secured a significant order worth approximately ₹187.7 crores. This development represents a substantial business milestone for the trading company, which has a market capitalization of ₹779.04 crores. The order value constitutes a meaningful portion relative to the company's market cap, potentially contributing to future revenue growth.
